title: Two-Way ANOVA Calculator (with Interaction) – Factorial Analysis

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Grand mean: \( \bar{Y} = \frac{1}{N} \sum_{i=1}^a \sum_{j=1}^b \sum_{k=1}^r Y_{ijk} \) SSA: \( SS_A = br \sum_{i=1}^a (\bar{Y}_{i..} - \bar{Y})^2 \) SSB: \( SS_B = ar \sum_{j=1}^b (\bar{Y}_{.j.} - \bar{Y})^2 \) SSAB: \( SS_{AB} = r \sum_{i=1}^a \sum_{j=1}^b (\bar{Y}_{ij.} - \bar{Y}_{i..} - \bar{Y}_{.j.} + \bar{Y})^2 \) SSE: \( SSE = \sum_{i=1}^a \sum_{j=1}^b \sum_{k=1}^r (Y_{ijk} - \bar{Y}_{ij.})^2 \) df: dfA=a−1, dfB=b−1, dfAB=(a−1)(b−1), dfE=ab(r−1), dfT=N−1

changes: Initial audit spec draft generated from HTML extraction (review required).
Verify formulas match the calculator engine and convert any text-only formulas to LaTeX.
